ajmc.corpora.corpora_classes module#

class ajmc.corpora.corpora_classes.Corpus(corpus_id: str)[source]#

Bases: ABC

Mother class for all Corpus-objects. Can be used to instantiate child-object via auto_init

classmethod auto_init(corpus_id)[source]#

This classmethod can be used to create the right object from the mother class

abstract data_dir() → Path[source]#
abstract files() → List[Path][source]#
get_chunks(chunk_size: int, unit: str = 'word') → List[str][source]#

Chunks the corpus into string chunk-size units.

Parameters:

  • chunk_size – The size of the chunks

  • unit – The unit of the chunks. Can be ‘word’ or ‘chararcter’
